message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I have to make a living. I can do $105, but that's as low as I can go.
I'm still interested in the product, but $105 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $97.50. Can you consider that?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I can do $100.50, but that's as low as I can go. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $97.50, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $100, but no more. Can you meet me at $100?

I can see you're really close to making a decision, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I can do $102.50, but that's the absolute max I can go. I'm not making any more concessions after this.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $100, but I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. Can you really not meet me at $100?
